parent.default: w-full flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4
parent.wizzard: bg-gradiant from-blue-500 to-purple-600 flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4
parent.accent: bg-gradiant from-blue-500 to-purple-600 flex  items-center justify-center gap-4 border

child.default: w-full flex flex-col items-center justify-between gap-8
child.wizzard: bg-gradiant from-blue-500 to-purple-600 flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4
child.accent: bg-gradiant from-blue-500 to-purple-600 flex  items-center justify-center gap-4

parent.medium: w-full grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4 grid-flow-row
parent.wizzard: lg:w-3/4 w-full mx-auto grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-1 grid-flow-row gap-2
parent.accent: lg:w-3/4 w-full grid grid-cols-2 gap-2 grid-flow-row

child.default: flex flex-col items-start justify-start gap-4 rounded-md border
child.medium: flex flex-col items-start justify-between rounded-md border
child.minimal: border-l-8 hover:translate-x-2   border border-zinc-100 flex flex-col items-start justify-start gap-4
child.wizzard: flex flex-col items-satrt border-r-8 border-l-8 justify-center gap-4 hover:translate-x-2
child.accent: flex flex-col  items-start justify-between border-t-8 gap-4 hover:border-b-8

parent.default: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 grid-flow-row  gap-2

child.default: w-[350px] flex flex-col items-center justify-between gap-4 rounded-md shadow-md
child.medium: w-[350px] flex flex-col justify-between items-center  gap-4 rounded-md
child.wizzard: w-[450px] h-[400px] grid grid-rows-2 grid-flow-row gap-4 rounded-md
child.accent: flex flex-col  items-center justify-center gap-4  rounded-xl

parent.default: w-full grid grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-4 grid-flow-row
parent.medium: w-full grid grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-4 grid-flow-row
parent.minimal: w-full flex justify-center items-center gap-4 flex-wrap
parent.wizzard: w-full flex  items-center justify-center gap-2 flex-wrap
parent.accent: w-full flex justify-center items-center gap-4 flex-wrap

child.default: flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-2  border rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl
child.minimal: flex  items-center justify-center gap-4 !bg-transparent border-none flex-wrap
child.wizzard: flex items-center justify-start gap-2 border-r-8 !bg-transparent border-l-0  border-t-0 border-b-0
child.accent: flex items-center justify-start lg:justify-center gap-4  border-none rounded-xl shadow-xl
